thread.title: Stars defenseman suspended for elbow to Pens Bonino
thread.title_full: Stars defenseman suspended for elbow to Pens Bonino

title: Stars defenseman suspended for elbow to Pens Bonino
text:
Stars defenseman Jason Demers suspended 2 games Published 7:03 PM EDT Oct 23, 2015 A Large Text Photos 
Dallas Stars defenseman Jason Demers was suspended for two games without pay by the NHL on Friday for elbowing Pittsburgh Penguins forward Nick Bonino. Related 
Demers received a major penalty and game misconduct for elbowing in the third period of the Stars' 4-1 victory at Pittsburgh on Thursday night. The suspension will cost Demers $36,559.
